label.minWidth: Min. width of the manufacturer (in px)

helpText.select: The selected manufacturers are displayed in the slider.
helpText.rotate: If this option is active, the manufacturers are sorted randomly.
helpText.minWidth: Set the minimum width for the manufacturer. The higher the value, the fewer manufacturers will be displayed per slide.
helpText.height:
Set this value to control the height of the slider. If the manufacturer images are active, the images with this value will all be set to the same height.

'auto' for automatic calculation
helpText.useLink: The manufacturers can be provided with a URL in the Shopware 6 Core settings. Check this option to enable the links.
helpText.onlyImages: If this option is active, only manufacturers to which no image is assigned will be output.
